title: Horseradish Cream Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Horseradish Cream Sauce Recipe
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Active
15 mins
Chilling Time
30 mins
Total
40 mins
Serves
12 servings
Makes
1 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
heavy cream
1/2
cup
crème fraîche
or
sour cream
1/2
cup
store-bought or homemade preserved
horseradish
2
tablespoons
minced chives
1
tablespoon
freshly squeezed
lemon juice
Kosher salt
Freshly ground black pepper
Directions
In a medium bowl, whisk heavy cream until thickened, but not yet at soft peaks.
Serious Eats
Fold in crème fraîche, horseradish, chives, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Refrigerate for 30 to 60 minutes before using, or transfer to airtight container and refrigerate up to 2 weeks.
